scripts.test-node: npm run setup-daemon; daemonIntegration=true port=50000 address=localhost mocha "`git rev-parse --show-toplevel`/src/**/*.test.js" --exit --timeout 8000
scripts.test-browser: cd `git rev-parse --show-toplevel`/src/test-browser; webpack main.test.js -o main.test.pack.js --mode="development"; open mocha.html
